name: NSPICTImageRep
desc: An object that renders an image from a PICT format data stream of version 1, version 2, and extended version 2.

items.name: init?(data: Data)
items.desc: Returns a representation of an image from the specified data in the PICT file format.

items.name: var boundingBox: NSRect
items.desc: The rectangle that bounds the image representation.
